text: course pages. Applications will open from 11 March 2025. **Some vocational courses, plus online and HDR courses are offered on a continuous basis. Information is available on individual course pages. Applications will be accepted for each program until all places are filled, so ensure you apply as early as possible for your application to be considered. Late applications may result in a delayed class commencement.The following programs have timely close dates that you will need to submit your application by*:*Late applications may continue to be accepted after these dates if places are still available.
